text: Pablo "Pabling" Paras Garcia (September 25, 1925 â€“ August 18, 2021) was a Filipino politician. He was born in Cebu, Philippines. He was the Governor of Cebu from 1995 until 2004. He was a member of the Philippine House of Representatives from 1987 until 1995 and again from 2007 until 2013. Garcia died on August 18, 2021 at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Cebu
title: Pablo P. Garcia
